question: Which of the following banks has prepared Kisan Credit Card (KCC) scheme ?
option4: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
answer: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
explanation: The Kisan Credit Card (KCC) is a credit card scheme which was introduced in 1998 by Indian Banks. The scheme was prepared by the NABARD. The main objective of the scheme is to meet the credit requirements of the agricultural sector.
